Seattle, WA

EnergySavvy just raised $7M. We're using software to help solve one of the world's biggest challenges: energy. We work with utilities across the country to improve their energy efficiency programs and to help individuals and businesses reduce energy consumption. Utilities spend almost $30B a year on energy efficiency. EnergySavvy gives them a greater impact.

We're hiring devs, designers, devops, sales, etc.
